授業目的: The purpose and the objective of the course is to teach all fundamental study and academic skills necessary for successfully completing undergraduate studies at the School of International Studies.
到達目標: The goal of the course is to make students to acquire all fundamental study and academic skills like searching for materials, evaluating materials, making notes, compiling reference lists, writing reports etc., which are necessary for successfully completing undergraduate studies at the university.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This class will be conducted face-to-face. Students who are not able to come to Japan will take part in the class online. Students living in countries with a large time difference, will follow the class by watching the videos taken in class each time.
Seminar format. Each class will pursue one task, which we will try to commonly achieve. There will be sufficient guidance and explanations given, on which students will then have to do various exercises.
